item.title: 小红书 (Rednote) and "TikTok refugees"
item.author: cancheta.dev@gmail.com (Charles Ancheta)
item.description: As a Canadian and a non-TikTok user, I was not exactly affected by the recent US TikTok ban. I do, however, occasionally use Xiaohongshu, which I try to avoid for the same reason as I do Instagram (it’s still social media app, after all i.e. massive time sink). This last week however, there was a huge influx of foreigners into the app which led to a lot of interesting and wholesome interactions (and a few not-so wholesome ones).
